item.title: Knative at SpringOne
item.description: I had an opportunity to keynote at this yearâ€™s SpringOne conference in DC on Serverless, Kubernetes, and more specifically Knative. I also covered the great work our open source team at Google been doing, making Spring 1st class citizen on Google Cloud Platform.
